org.firebirdsql.jdbc

Interface FirebirdParameterMetaData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.sql.ParameterMetaData, java.sql.Wrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FBParameterMetaData

    public interface FirebirdParameterMetaData
extends java.sql.ParameterMetaData
    Firebird extension to the ParameterMetaData interface.
